title: Australia presents: Christmas in Australia
creator_credit: Richard Mason, Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Australia’s Christmas is not the traditional day of snow and ice, but a warm sweltering day in mid-summer. The old traditions are preserved.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Mason, Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
description: Australia’s Christmas is not the traditional day of snow and ice, but a warm sweltering day in mid-summer. This film shows typical scenes of Christmas celebrations in 1950’s Australia, from the busy shops and streets of the cities, to small churches of rural country towns, even a festive feast at the beach.
description_for_label: Australia’s Christmas is not the traditional day of snow and ice, but a warm sweltering day in mid-summer. This film shows typical scenes of Christmas celebrations in 1950’s Australia, from the busy shops and streets of the cities, to small churches of rural country towns, even a festive feast at the beach.
